betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe seared furnace uses lava to run, and can process multiple items in parallel.

It can be built out of any cubic shape, as long as the interior is empty, and the seared tank is located on a corner. The bigger, the more parallel recipes it can perform.

§fHaving good bricks to build a furnace is also great for more mundane smelting tasks!
